meanings.definition: A rare barium- and titanium-containing silicate mineral of the osumilite group.
meanings.english_definition: A rare barium- and titanium-containing silicate mineral of the osumilite group.

examples.sentence: The chemical formula of Lederite is (K,Na,[])(Ba,K)2(Mg,Fe)2(Al,Ti)3Si9O30.

etymology.value: Named after Louis Lederer, a mineral collector.
